chunk:
Naturopathica Neroli Clarifying Oil  (2018 formulation)

Brand: Naturopathica

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Arctostaphylos Uva Ursi (Bearberry) Leaf Extract, Copaifera Officinalis (Balsam Copaiba) Resin, Carapa Guaianensis Seed Oil, Euterpe Oleracea (Acai) Pulp Oil, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Neroli) Flower Oil, Citrus Aurantium (Petitgrain Bigarade) Leaf/Bud Oil, Juniperus Communis (Juniper) Berry Oil,

Carapa Guaianensis Seed Oil, Euterpe Oleracea (Acai) Pulp Oil, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Neroli) Flower Oil, Citrus Aurantium (Petitgrain Bigarade) Leaf/Bud Oil, Juniperus Communis (Juniper) Berry Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract

Directions: Apply a small amount of oil to fingertips and massage into skin in a circular motion. For best results, apply a small amount of oil with two pumps of a Naturopathica Mist to fingertips and massage into skin daily at night.

Warnings: For external use only. Keep out of reach of children. Keep away from eyes and immediate eye area. If contact occurs, rinse with water to remove. Stop use and consult a doctor if rash or irritation persist.
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
